TopicTitle: Hello to all you Kerbonauts out there

Articles.Content: I've been playing KSP for a few months now and decided to stop lurking and join the forums. I've gotten lots of great tips from this place and some interesting design ideas as well. I also recently got back into building and launching model rockets (last time I launched I was about 8 years old ), and I can safely say KSP was at least partially responsible for rekindling that hobby.
Welcome to the forum, Kerbayashi Maru. May your ships fare better than your namesake.
